name: Chained JailBreak
description:
Two prisoners are trying to escape the dungeon labyrinth prison.

GMTK Game Jam submission page.

Controls:

     Use arrow keys or WASD to move prisoners.

     Press Space to switch between prisoners.

Unfortunately I didn't have enough free time to find some art and sounds, but at least I have a full game cycle. I hope this prototype will be enough to see the idea.

NOTE: If you have problems starting web-version, please, try the windows build.
